channel.title: 525 Adding Shops on Hybrid PVP
channel.description: Hello! I need to be able to add shops for my 525 server, it is Hybrid PVp source and a 525. I have no idea really how to make a npc a shop. I need help, I have tried using shopassistant.java and I am not sure what to use. Please help me :) Thanks -owner owwch :eek:

OMG, thanks so much!

item.title: 525 Adding Shops on Hybrid PVP
item.dc:creator: @iz3_legend iz3 legend
item.description:
@iz3_legend wrote:

step 1. Spawn the desired Npc

step 2. Go To action handler.java and find first click npc or second click npc (recommned 2nd click npc) (src/server/model/players/actionhandler)

step 3. Make a new case i supplied this example one and add it in with the others:

case 541:
c.getShops().openShop(26);
break; thats an example now ill explain it.
EXPLAIN:

case NPC ID:
c.getShops().openShop(Shop number it opens);
break;

step 4. Now head to shops.cfg (data/cfg/shops)

shop number 2 2 itemid amount and so on

step 5. now to head to prices.txt and change the cost of items in your shop use a code like this:

itemid price
________________________________________kk have fun

Read full topic
